resources.string: This is the Contacts Hacker App. It changes all of the contacts on this device\'s contact list into whatever you want; for example, \"Batman\".
There are no changes to undo.

This app backs up contacts by writing them to an external file, which allows it to undo its changes even if it\'s uninstalled. In order for this to happen, you need to give us access to this device\'s external storage.
Here, you can rename each of the contacts on this device to a random name from your \"grab bag\" below.
Your grab bag needs to have at least 1 name in it.
Simply click on any one of the preset lists below to use it as your \"grab bag\".
Are you sure that you want to rename each of the contacts on this device to a randomly selected member of the \"
Enter in the name you want to change all of this device\'s contacts into.
